SETTINGS.OverlayConfigH: Open the form to configure the Combatant Overlay
SETTINGS.CollapseNavH: Collapse the Scene Navigation Bar when Combat Carousel is rendered
SETTINGS.ShowBar1H: Shows resource bar (if configured). Options are: Always: always show the bar (if any). Active Combatant: only show the bar for the Active Combatant. Hover: only show the bar on hover. Never: never show the bar. Note: additional GM settings may restrict bar visibility.
SETTINGS.Bar1PermissionH: Define what circumstances to show bar 1 to players. All: show bars on all Combatants. Owned: bars shown for any tokens the player owns. Observer: bars shown for any tokens the player has observer permission on. None: Do not show players any bars.
SETTINGS.ShowOverlayH: Shows overlay (if configured). Options are: Always: always show the overlay. Active Combatant: only show the overlay for the Active Combatant. Hover: only show the overlay on hover. Never: never show the overlay. Note: additional GM settings may restrict overlay visibility.
SETTINGS.ShowEffectsH: Shows Active Effects in the Carousel. Works best if Active Effects are used by conditions and similar purposes. All: Show All Effects. None: Show No Effects. Active: Show Only Active Effects. Active and Passive Effects: Show Effects which are either Active or Passive (ie. ignore Inactive Effects).
SETTINGS.OverlayPermissionH: Define what circumstances to show Overlay to players. All: show overlay on all Combatants. Owner: overlay shown for any tokens the player owns. Observer: overlay shown for any tokens the player has observer permission on. Limited: overlay shown for any tokens the player has limited permission on. None: Do not show players any overlay.
SETTINGS.Bar1AttributeH: Enter a path to an Actor attribute to use for the bar. Single value attributes will show a single number. Attributes with a value and a max property will show a meter that depletes as the value decreases (eg. health).
SETTINGS.Bar1TitleH: The name to be displayed on the bar (eg. HP)
SETTINGS.ShowInitiativeH: Shows initiative value (if any). Options are: Always: always show the value (if any). Active Combatant: only show the value for the Active Combatant. Hover: only show the value on hover. Never: never show the value.
SETTINGS.ShowInitiativeIconH: Shows initiative icon (if any). Options are: Always: always show the icon (if any). With Initiative Value: show icon when initiative is shown. For Unrolled Combatants: show icon when combatant has no initiative value. Never: never show the icon
SETTINGS.InitiativePermissionH: Define what circumstances to show Initiative to players. All: show initiative on all Combatants. Owner: initiative shown for any tokens the player owns. Observer: initiative shown for any tokens the player has observer permission on. Limited: overlay shown for any tokens the player has limited permission on. None: Do not show players any initiative.
SETTINGS.ImageTypeH: Select which Image to use for Combatants in the Carousel. Options are: Actor: the Actor's image. Token Actor: the Token Actor's image (will show Actor image if Token Actor image not set). Token: The token's image
SETTINGS.CarouselSizeH: The size of the Carousel on the screen. HUD/Control elements are not scaled.
SETTINGS.ControlActiveCombatantTokenH: Enable to automatically control (select) the token associated to the currently Active Combatant.
SETTINGS.PanOnClickH: Pans to the matching token when a card is clicked (note: the token must be 'visible' to the current user)
SETTINGS.AlwaysOnTopH: Always render the Carousel above other UI elements.
SETTINGS.OpenOnCombatCreateN: Open Combat Carousel on Combat Creation
SETTINGS.OpenOnCombatCreateH: Opens the Carousel when a Combat is created
